column1: Funeral services will be held at 11:00 A.M. on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at Immanuel Lutheran Church in Giese
column4: MN with Pastors Roy Lovaas and Richard Langhorst officiating. Visitation will be on Tuesday
column6: 2015 from 5 until 7 P.M. at Methven Funeral Home in Sandstone
column7: as well as one hour prior to the service at the church. Burial will be at Immanuel Lutheran Cemetery in Giese.
